channel.title: Digital Transport on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Transport on 0x000216

item.title: Video-Film Production Bandwidth
item.description: The shift to digital video and film production has made it possible to work with collaborators across the globe. While physical delivery of tapes and disks is an option, tight production timelines often necessitate electronic file transfer. This, however, raises questions about how to carry out the process and the associated costs. Bandwidth is the defining feature of digital transfer services, representing the transmission speed in bits per second. It’s typically measured in Mbps or Gbps, and generally speaking, a higher bandwidth comes with a higher price tag.
